languages.text: Вы склоняетесь над бойцом — и успеваете заметить спрятанную под телом взведенную мину.

traits.locale_text: Вы склоняетесь над бойцом — и успеваете заметить спрятанную под телом взведенную мину.

languages.text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.
languages.original_text: Вы склоняетесь над бойцом — и успеваете заметить спрятанную под телом взведенную мину.

traits.locale_text: You lean over the guard — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.
You lean over the guard — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.
You lean over the guard — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.
You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

languages.text: 你俯身查看这个士兵的尸体，发现他的身体下面藏着一颗武装地雷。
languages.original_text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

traits.locale_text: 你俯身查看这个士兵的尸体，发现他的尸体下面藏着一颗武装地雷。

languages.text: Te inclinas sobre el soldado y ves la mina armada bajo su cuerpo.
languages.original_text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

traits.locale_text: Te inclinas sobre el soldado y ves la mina armada bajo su cuerpo.

languages.text: 兵士に顔を近づける―すると、男の下にある地雷に気がついた。
languages.original_text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

traits.locale_text: 兵士に顔を近づける―すると、男の下にある地雷に気がついた。

languages.text: Du beugst dich über den Soldaten – und entdeckst die scharfe Mine unter seinem Körper.
languages.original_text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

traits.locale_text: Du beugst dich über den Soldaten – und entdeckst die scharfe Mine unter seinem Körper.

languages.text: Vous vous penchez sur le soldat et repérez la mine cachée sous son corps.
languages.original_text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

traits.locale_text: Vous vous penchez sur le soldat et repérez la mine cachée sous son corps.

languages.text: Askere doğru eğiliyor ve bedeninin altına gizlenmiş mayını fark ediyorsun.
languages.original_text: You lean over the soldier — and you spot the armed mine hidden under his body.

traits.locale_text: Askere doğru eğiliyor ve bedeninin altına gizlenmiş mayını fark ediyorsun.
